about.subtitle: is a visual artist from Charente, dedicated to her creations, providing a space for her creativity to flourish
about.text1: Trained in cabinetry at the Boulle School, she obtained a Bachelor's degree in Plastic Arts from the European Higher School of Art in Brittany and a diploma in art therapy from the Faculty of Medicine in Poitiers
about.text2: Passionate about visual arts, drawing, and painting, her artistic universe, inspired by her travels and her maritime family culture, is characterized by an imaginary world in perpetual recomposition, emphasizing movement and visual effects
about.text3: Her artistic work transforms reality through the manipulation of materials, blending instinct, creative impulse, and constant exploration.
about.quoteText: Margritt crafts works paying tribute to her travea familial culture deeply rooted in the maritime world, immersing viewers in an ever-evolving imaginary realm — Her creations explore instinct, creative impulse, and constant artistic inquiry, transforming reality through material work and challenging our visual perspective
